channel.title: CVE Feed for Themify -- Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themify -- Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter

item.title: CVE-2024-44046|2024-10-07T13:09:16.754Z -- themify -- themify%20%E2%80%93%20woocommerce%20product%20filter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter: from n/a through 1.5.1.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Themify – WooCommerce Product Filter: from n/a through 1.5.1.
